1.0.name: wordpress/link-hopper
1.0.description:
Easily set up links like /hop/google/ to redirect users to http://www.google.com. This can be useful in masking your affiliate links.

If your affiliate link needs to change, you can just change the HOP values in a single place, without having to search your site for outdated links.
